import React, { Component } from "react"; var https = require("https"); class Calculator extends React.Component { state = { apiKey: "4b2ea96ceadc94e3995c", currency: "cad", currencies: { CAD: "CAD", USD: "USD", NGN: "NGN", EUR: "EUR", INR: "INR", GBP: "GBP", AUD: "AUD", ZAR: "ZAR", AED: "AED", CNY: "CNY" }, values: { chequing: 2000.0, savings_for_taxes: 4000.0, rainy_day_fund: 506.0, savings_for_fun: 5000.0, savings_for_travel: 400.0, savings_for_personal_development: 200.0, investment_1: 5000.0, investment_2: 60000.0, investment_3: 24000.0, primary_home: 455000.0, second_home: 1564321.0, credit_card_1: 4342.0, credit_card_2: 322.0, mortgage_1: 250999.0, mortgage_2: 632634.0, line_of_credit: 10000.0, investment_loan: 10000.0 } }; convertCurrency = (amount, fromCurrency, toCurrency) => { fromCurrency = encodeURIComponent(fromCurrency); toCurrency = encodeURIComponent(toCurrency); var query = fromCurrency + "_" + toCurrency; var values = this.state.values; var updated_values = {}; var url = "https://free.currconv.com/api/v7/convert?q=" + query + "&compact=ultra&apiKey=" + this.state.apiKey; https.get(url, function(res) { var body = ""; res.on("data", function(chunk) { body += chunk; }); console.log(this.state); res.on("end", function() { try { var jsonObj = JSON.parse(body); var val = jsonObj[query]; if (val) { for (let [key, value] of Object.entries(values)) { var total = val * value; var conversion = Math.round(total * 100) / 100; updated_values[key] = conversion; } console.log(updated_values); return updated_values; } else { var err = new Error("Value not found for " + query); console.log(err); } } catch (e) { console.log("Parse error: ", e); } }); }); }; getCurrency = e => { this.setState({ currency: e.target.value }); let uptt = this.convertCurrency(10, "USD", "CAD"); console.log(uptt); }; render() { return (

); } } export default Calculator;
